'''Akira''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the [[Taurus Iracundus Chapter]], Act I: [[Rise Up, Golden Soul]].

He first appeared in ''[https://youtu.be/KGjnRThxe7k Character Teaser - "Arataki Itto: That's How the Show Should Go!"]'' alongside fellow [[Arataki Gang]] members [[Genta]] and [[Mamoru]].

==Profile==
According to [[Arataki Itto]], Akira snores very loudly.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Oni's Pride}}</ref>
